resources.string: Forecast weather data is collected using the OpenWeatherMap API; http://www.openweathermap.org/.
Climate data is collected using the WeatherUnderground API; http://www.wunderground.com/.
Welcome! This app will help you make a packing list designed specially for your holiday.

You will have to fill in a form about where you will be headed, when you will go there and How long you will be going on vacation. After you press the "plan" button, you will see your own personalised packing list.
If there are major weather changes at yor destination, you will be notified about the changes in your packing list.
Press proceed to start and enter the details about your trip!
